info.name: Booking Website API - Complete Documentation
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Booking Website. This collection includes all endpoints with detailed descriptions, examples, and automated token handling.

## Authentication
All protected endpoints require a Bearer token in the Authorization header. Use the Login endpoint to get your token, then it will be automatically saved and used for subsequent requests.

## Base URL
Default: `http://localhost:3000`

## Response Format
All responses follow this structure:
- Success: `{ success: true, message: string, data: any }`
- Paginated: `{ success: true, data: array, meta: { page, limit, total, totalPages } }`
- Error: `{ success: false, message: string, statusCode: number }`

exec: pm.test('Response time is less than 5000ms', function () {

item.name: 0. Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration and login. No authentication required.

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string, required): Valid email address
- `userName` (string, required): Username (min 2 characters)
- `password` (string, required): Password (min 8 characters)
- `confirmPassword` (string, required): Must match password

**Response:**
- Status: 201 Created
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: { user: UserResponseDto, token: string } }`

Login with email and password to get JWT token.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string, required): Registered email address
- `password` (string, required): User password

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: { user: UserResponseDto, token: string } }`

**Note:** Token is automatically saved to collection variables for use in other requests.

item.name: 1. Users
item.description: User management endpoints. Most endpoints require authentication. Admin-only endpoints are marked.

request.description:
Get paginated list of all users. **Admin only.**

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (number, optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (number, optional): Items per page (default: 10)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, data: UserResponseDto[], meta: { page, limit, total, totalPages } }`

Get user details by ID. Users can only view their own profile unless they are admin.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): User ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: UserResponseDto }`

Create a new user. **Admin only.**

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string, required): Valid email address
- `userName` (string, required): Username
- `password` (string, required): Password (min 8 characters)
- `role` (enum, optional): User role - `admin` or `normal_user` (default: `normal_user`)

**Response:**
- Status: 201 Created
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: UserResponseDto }`

Update user information. Users can only update their own profile unless they are admin.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): User ID

**Request Body:**
- `userName` (string, optional): New username
- `email` (string, optional): New email
- `password` (string, optional): New password (min 8 characters)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: UserResponseDto }`

Delete a user. Users can only delete their own account unless they are admin.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): User ID

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: { message: string } }`

item.name: 2. Destinations
item.description: Destination management endpoints. Public read access, admin-only write access.

request.description:
Get paginated list of all destinations. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (number, optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (number, optional): Items per page (default: 10)
- `name` (string, optional): Filter by destination name

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, data: DestinationResponseDto[], meta: { page, limit, total, totalPages } }`

**Note:** Response includes `packagesCount` and `minPrice` for each destination.

Get destination details by ID. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Destination ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: DestinationResponseDto }`

**Note:** Response includes `packagesCount` and `minPrice`.

formdata.value: Beautiful beach city with crystal clear waters and amazing coral reefs

request.description:
Create a new destination. **Admin only.**

**Request Body (multipart/form-data):**
- `name` (string, required): Destination name (2-100 characters)
- `description` (string, required): Destination description (min 3 characters)
- `image` (file, required): Destination image file (JPG/PNG)

**Response:**
- Status: 201 Created
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: DestinationResponseDto }`

Update destination information. **Admin only.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Destination ID

**Request Body (multipart/form-data):**
- `name` (string, optional): New destination name
- `description` (string, optional): New description
- `image` (file, optional): New destination image (replaces existing)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: DestinationResponseDto }`

Delete a destination. **Admin only.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Destination ID

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: { message: string } }`

item.name: 3. Packages
item.description: Package management endpoints. Public read access, admin-only write access.

request.description:
Get paginated list of packages for a specific destination. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**

**Query Parameters:**
- `destinationId` (string, required): Destination ID (MongoDB ObjectId)
- `page` (number, optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (number, optional): Items per page (default: 10)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, data: PackageListItemDto[], meta: { page, limit, total, totalPages } }`

Get package details by ID. **Public endpoint - no authentication required.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Package ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: PackageDetailDto }`

formdata.value: Adventure awaits with this amazing package

formdata.description: Included services (JSON array or comma-separated, optional)

request.description:
Create a new package. **Admin only.**

**Request Body (multipart/form-data):**
- `destinationId` (string, required): Destination ID (MongoDB ObjectId)
- `name` (string, required): Package name (2-100 characters)
- `description` (string, required): Package description
- `duration` (number, required): Duration in days (min 1)
- `groupSize` (number, required): Maximum group size (min 1)
- `price` (number, required): Package price (min 0)
- `included` (array, optional): Included services (can be JSON array or comma-separated string)
- `image` (file, required): Package image file (JPG/PNG)

**Response:**
- Status: 201 Created
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: PackageDetailDto }`

Update package information. **Admin only.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Package ID

**Request Body (multipart/form-data):**
- `name` (string, optional): New package name
- `description` (string, optional): New description
- `duration` (number, optional): New duration in days
- `groupSize` (number, optional): New maximum group size
- `price` (number, optional): New price
- `included` (array, optional): New included services
- `image` (file, optional): New package image (replaces existing)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: PackageDetailDto }`

Delete a package. **Admin only.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Package ID

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: { message: string } }`

item.name: 4. Bookings
item.description: Booking management endpoints. All endpoints require authentication. Users can only access their own bookings unless they are admin.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, confirmed, canceled

request.description:
Get paginated list of bookings. Users see only their own bookings. Admins see all bookings.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (number, optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (number, optional): Items per page (default: 10)
- `userId` (string, optional): Filter by user ID (Admin only)
- `packageId` (string, optional): Filter by package ID
- `status` (enum, optional): Filter by status - `pending`, `confirmed`, `canceled`

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, data: BookingListItemDto[], meta: { page, limit, total, totalPages } }`

Get booking details by ID. Users can only view their own bookings unless they are admin.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Booking ID (MongoDB ObjectId)

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: BookingDetailDto }`

Create a new booking. **Authentication required.**

**Request Body:**
- `packageId` (string, required): Package ID (MongoDB ObjectId)
- `numberOfPeople` (number, required): Number of people (min 1)
- `totalPrice` (number, required): Total price (min 0)
- `contact` (object, required): Contact information
  - `name` (string, required): Contact name
  - `email` (string, required): Valid email address
  - `phone` (string, required): Phone number
- `status` (enum, optional): Booking status - `pending`, `confirmed`, `canceled` (default: `pending`)

**Response:**
- Status: 201 Created
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: BookingDetailDto }`

Update booking information. Users can only update their own bookings unless they are admin.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Booking ID

**Request Body:**
- `packageId` (string, optional): New package ID
- `numberOfPeople` (number, optional): New number of people (min 1)
- `totalPrice` (number, optional): New total price (min 0)
- `status` (enum, optional): New status - `pending`, `confirmed`, `canceled`

**Note:** Contact information cannot be updated. Contact is tied to the booking.

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: BookingDetailDto }`

Delete a booking. **Admin only.**

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (string, required): Booking ID

**Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: string, data: { message: string } }`
